title: Equiniti lines up for £400m London float
text:

The company responsible for paying pensions to millions of former government workers is set to go public in a deal that could value the private equity-backed business at more than £700 million. 
Equiniti, which manages pensions and employee share schemes for clients ranging from the civil service to nearly every blue-chip UK company, is preparing a London listing that is expected to raise close to £400 million.
